56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Ata':I and 'Ubai bin `Umar went to `Aisha while she was staying near Thabir (i.e. a mountain). She said, "There is no Migration after Allah gave His Prophet victory over Mecca

chapter.eng-name: There is no emigration after the Conquest
